Binary Arithmetic
Activity 1. Addition
  9876543210
111011101011 = 3819
          11 = 3
111011101110 = 3822

   9876543210
 111011101011 = 3819
 111011101011 = 3819
1110111010110 = 7638

Activity 2. Subtraction
  9876543210
111011101011 = 3819
          11 = 3
111011101000 = 3816

  9876543210
111011101011 = 3819
     1110101 = 117
111001110110 = 3702

Activity 3. Shift right
  9876543210
111011101011 = 3819
011101110101 = 1909 
             = (3819-1)/2

Activity 4.
  9876543210
 111011101011 = 3819
1110111010110 = 7638
              = 3819*2
